snippet: Connecticut’s football coach, Paul Pasqualoni, was fired Monday with his team 0-4 in his third season and the most recent loss by 41-12 at Buffalo.
abstract: Connecticut’s football coach, Paul Pasqualoni, is fired, with his team 0-4 in his third season and the most recent loss by 41-12 at Buffalo.
lead_paragraph: Connecticut’s football coach, Paul Pasqualoni, was fired Monday with his team 0-4 in his third season and the most recent loss by 41-12 at Buffalo.

headline.main: Pasqualoni Fired at Connecticut After 0-4 Start
